meanings.definition: Junglists: A person who is a fan or enthusiast of jungle music.
meanings.sent1: The junglists at the concert danced all night to the jungle music.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the junglists playing jungle music from their car.
meanings.sent3: The junglists organized a jungle music party in the park.
meanings.sent4: The city streets echoed with the beats of the junglists' jungle music.
meanings.sent5: The junglists wore shirts with jungle music symbols to show their passion.

meanings.definition: Junglists: Plural form of junglist, referring to a group of individuals who enjoy jungle music.
meanings.sent1: A large group of junglists gathered at the jungle music festival.
meanings.sent2: The junglists brought their own drums to the jungle music event.
meanings.sent3: The junglists decided to start a jungle music band together.
meanings.sent4: The forest echoed with the laughter of the junglists enjoying jungle music.
meanings.sent5: The junglists' love for jungle music united them as a close-knit community.
